The post on the Facebook page: Africa is HOME" claimed that French President Emmanuel Macron announced a European travel ban for Africans who refuse a COVID-19 vaccine.
Similar Facebook posts with the same cla: Morocco, and the Democratic Republic of Congo.
The French foreign ministry rejected the: baseless," and the French president does not have the power to impose a Europe-wide travel ban on Africans. Only the European Commission could propose such legislation.
